ProductInfo.Features:
Newest Allwinner Dual Core CPU (1.2GHz) with Quad core 544MP2@286MHz GPU, offer unprecedented fast surfing online, video playing and 3D games playing experience.
9.7" TFT LCD Screen (4£º3),Support WiFi+3G+GPS
Google Android 4.2.2 (Jelly Bean) OS reveals tons of new adventures to your iRulu Touch tablet. Get access to thousands of useful apps and fun games to download and install on you tablet with Google Play Store pre-installed. Micro SD card slot allows you to add up to 32GB extra space to store songs, videos, photos and other files.
With front & back dual cameras (0.3MP & 2MP), be adequate for skype video chat and taking general pictures.
Built-in 3.7V 8000mAh Li-Polymer rechargeable battery, enjoy longer running time (almost 5 hours for surfing and movies, 3 days for stand-by status)
